content:
What's Included with the Packster2 70 Family

We're excited to offer you the Packster2 70 Family. Here is everything that comes with your package:

  • Powerful Bosch Cargo Line (Smart System) Motor
  • High-Capacity 625Wh Battery for Extended Range
  • Comfortable Passenger Cabin with Safety Belts
  • Integrated Front and Rear Lights for Safety
  • Weatherproof Buggy Option With Roll Cage to Protect Your Cargo and Family
  • Versatile Load Area for Cargo or Child Seating
  • Hydraulic Disc Brakes for Reliable Stopping Power
  • Ergonomic Saddle and Adjustable Handlebar for Comfort
  • Purion 200 Intuitive Controls

Everything you need for your family adventures is included, designed for maximum comfort and convenience!
